ygData.subject: REST article
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a new article I wrote for Linux magazine designed for people who have never heard of REST. It shows the migration of a simple XML-RPC service to REST,

I have a new article I wrote for Linux magazine designed for people who 
have never heard of REST. It shows the migration of a simple XML-RPC 
service to REST, demonstrating both the costs and benefits of the 
conversion.

  Paul
